issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting pre-existing conditions, and lowering prescription drug costs

issues.title: Auto Industry Support
issues.description: Strong advocate for protecting Michigan's automotive manufacturing jobs and supporting electric vehicle transition

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports aggressive climate change legislation, renewable energy investments, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Gun Violence Prevention
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive background checks and stricter gun control measures

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship and protection for DACA recipients

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Supports major infrastructure spending to rebuild roads, bridges, and modernize transportation systems

issues.title: Women's Rights
issues.description: Strong advocate for reproductive rights, equal pay, and workplace protections for women

issues.title: Labor Rights
issues.description: Supports strengthening union protections, raising minimum wage, and improving worker benefits
